name: createApiApplication
description: Create a new API Application with specified permissions

applicationName.description: A name for the API Application to help you identify it

enabled.description: Whether or not this API Application can be used

expiry.description: The date that this API Application can no longer be used.

ican.description: The ICAN of one of your Fire accounts. Restrict this API Application to a certan account.

numberOfPayeeApprovalsRequired.description: Number of approvals required to create a payee in a batch

numberOfPaymentApprovalsRequired.description: Number of approvals required to process a payment in a batch

body.title: newApiApplication
body.description: Details of the new API Application

$ul: **applicationId**: The ID of the API Application
**clientId**: The Client ID of the new API Application
**clientKey**: The Client Key of the new API Application
**enabled**: Whether or not this API Application can be used
**expiry**: The date that this API Application can no longer be used.
**ican**: The ICAN of one of your Fire accounts. Restrict this API Application to a certan account.
**numberOfPayeeApprovalsRequired**: Number of approvals required to create a payee in a batch
**numberOfPaymentApprovalsRequired**: Number of approvals required to process a payment in a batch
**refreshToken**: The Refresh Token of the new API Application
